Ingredients.10: 0.25 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Bring water, rice, and grapeseed oil to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes. Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes; fluff with a fork.

Directions.3: Whisk soy milk, brown sugar, and salt together in a large bowl.

Directions.4: Pour rice into a casserole dish; pour soy milk mixture on top. Add cinnamon sticks, cloves, and vanilla. Cover.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until set, 30 to 45 minutes. Remove cinnamon sticks and cloves. Dust with ground cinnamon.
